description: Triangle T(n,k)of numbers of asymmetric Boolean functions of n variables with exactly k = 0..2^n nonzero values (atoms) under action of complementing group C(n,2).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
formula: T(n, k) = coefficient of x^k in (1/2^n)*Sum((-1)^j*2^C(j, 2)*[n, j]*(1+x^(2^j))^(2^(n-j)), j = 0..n), where [n, j] is Gaussian 2-binomial coefficient; k = 0..2^n.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 13 2000
